description: Photo management application with AI-powered face detection and organization

features.name: People Section: Context Menu Support
features.description: Right-click context menu on person cards with rename/merge/delete/details actions
tests: Right-click on person card shows context menu
Rename action updates person name in database
Delete action removes person and reloads section
Details action shows person information dialog

features.name: People Section: Drag-and-Drop Face Merging
features.description: Drag one person card onto another to merge face clusters
tests: Drag person card starts drag operation
Drop on another person card triggers merge
Merge combines face clusters using ReferenceDB.merge_face_clusters
Merge shows comprehensive feedback (duplicates, unique moved, faces reassigned)
Section reloads after successful merge

features.name: People Section: Circular Face Thumbnails
features.description: Display face thumbnails in circular format like Google Photos
tests: Face thumbnails are displayed as circles
Thumbnails load from BLOB or file path
Fallback to emoji icon if no thumbnail available

features.name: People Section: Multi-Row Grid Layout
features.description: Flow layout that wraps person cards across multiple rows
tests: Person cards wrap to new rows when container width is exceeded
Grid adjusts dynamically to window resize
Scrolling works smoothly with many people

features.name: People Section: Person Selection for Filtering
features.description: Click person card to filter main grid by that person
tests: Clicking person card emits personSelected signal
Main photo grid filters to show only photos of selected person
Selection state is maintained during session

features.name: Modular Accordion Sidebar Architecture
features.description: Refactored accordion sidebar into separate section modules
tests: AccordionSidebar orchestrates section modules
Each section (People, Dates, Folders, etc.) is in separate file
Signals propagate correctly from sections to sidebar to layout
Section loading is thread-safe with generation tracking

features.name: Face Detection and Scanning
features.description: Background face detection on imported photos
tests: Face detection runs automatically on photo import
Face clusters are stored in face_branch_reps table
Representative face thumbnails are saved as BLOB

features.name: Photo Import and Folder Scanning
features.description: Import photos from folders and scan for metadata
tests: User can select folder to import photos
Photos are added to database with metadata
Thumbnails are generated and cached
Progress is shown during import

features.name: Main Photo Grid Display
features.description: Display photos in grid layout with lazy loading
tests: Photos displayed in grid with thumbnails
Lazy loading loads visible photos first
Grid scrolls smoothly with many photos
Selection and multi-select work correctly

features.name: Date-Based Filtering
features.description: Filter photos by year, month, or day from dates section
tests: Dates section shows hierarchical year > month > day tree
Clicking date filter updates main grid
Date counts are accurate
Clear filter returns to all photos

features.name: Folder-Based Filtering
features.description: Filter photos by source folder from folders section
tests: Folders section shows folder hierarchy
Clicking folder filters main grid
Folder photo counts are accurate
Clear filter returns to all photos

features.name: Videos Section
features.description: Separate section for video files with filtering
tests: Videos section shows video files separately
Video thumbnails display correctly
Video filtering works (all, short, long, HD, etc.)
Video playback works from grid

features.name: Quick Dates Section
features.description: Quick access to common date filters (Today, Yesterday, Last 7 days, etc.) without navigating the date hierarchy
tests: Quick dates section displays all 8 quick date options
Today button filters to current day (YYYY-MM-DD format)
Yesterday button filters to previous day
Last 7 days button filters to rolling 7-day window
Last 30 days button filters to rolling 30-day window
This month button filters to current calendar month
Last month button filters to previous calendar month
This year button filters to current calendar year
Last year button filters to previous calendar year
Date calculations handle year/month rollovers correctly
Quick date selection emits quickDateSelected signal
Photo grid filters correctly when quick date selected
Button styling matches Google Photos design
